question: During oxidation of one molecule of glucose, ______ molecules of \text{CO}_2 are formed. [2025]

solution:
(B)
ii. During glycolysis: One glucose molecule (6C) is broken down into 2 molecules of pyruvate (3C each).

question: The first stable compound of C4 pathway is __________.
